original_text: Then the king said to the wise men, which knew the times, (for so was the king's manner toward all that knew law and judgment:
korean_text: 왕이 사례를 아는 현자들에게 묻되 (왕이 규례와 법률을 아는 자에게 묻는 전례가 있는데

sentences.original_text: Then the king said to the wise men
for so was the king's manner
toward all that knew law and judgment
sentences.korean_translation: 율법과 판결을 아는 모든 사람에 대한 것이었다
